    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aboleth Transmutation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2677) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 395, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 5</row>

</column>

---

You have tapped into the ancient magic used by [alghollthu](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=1) masters (also known as aboleths) to mold the flesh of your ancestors. You can use this magic to transfigure other beings. You gain 3rd-level [_feet to fins_](/Spells.aspx?ID=113) and 2nd-level [_water breathing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=370) as arcane innate spells. You can cast each of these arcane innate spells once per day.
